title: Ticket #5294: Restore RPATH to EL6 build
description:
The condor binaries on the EL6 RPMs do not have RPATH or RUNPATH set in them. They have no way to pick up their external libraries (such as globus).

We think this is the root cause of the trouble in the long condor-users thread with the subject "CREAM error: Failed to start gahp" - you can read this thread from the archives at http://goo.gl/6gTUZM

This is especially troubling for HTCondor binaries that need globus libraries, such as for CREAM support - the problem looks like this 

$ /usr/sbin/nordugrid_gahp
/usr/sbin/nordugrid_gahp: error while loading shared libraries:
libglobus_rsl.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or
directory
